issue.title: Wiki links off main page busted and what's release plan?

content.raw:
From main bitbucket page #!/osrf/drcsim/overview

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC  takes you to http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki//DRC not http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC (two slashes before DRC)

The http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install  link gives me a "no text on this page error.
instead of  http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#Installation

and similar errors
content.html:
From main bitbucket page #!/osrf/drcsim/overview

http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC takes you to http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki//DRC not http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC (two slashes before DRC)

The http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install link gives me a "no text on this page error. instead of http://wiki.gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#Installation

and similar errors
